title: Back into the sun
creator_credit: ONF | NFB, Julian Biggs and Fergus McDonell
brief_description: Illustrates how the hospital of the Allen Memorial Institute in Montreal helps patients back to mental and emotional health. The case presented is of a woman who is under severe emotional distress. Interviews with a psychiatrist and group therapy sessions show her the root of her trouble, and set her on the right path to overcoming her problem.
